      • sum

        public static double sum(java.util.Scanner lectorstr,
                         java.lang.String exp1,
                         double result,
                         double r1,
                         double r2,
                         double r3,
                         double r4,
                         double r5,
                         double r6,
                         double r7,
                         double r8,
                         double r9,
                         double r10)
        This method realizes the sum between two values. pre: The user already knows how the calculator works and how to operate with the last ten results. post: The math operation has been realized.
        Parameters:
        lectorstr - is the Scanner that reads the user's input and has already been created.
        exp1 - is what the user typed first and it is a valid value.
        result - stores the value of the last math operation.
        r's - are the variables that store the value of the last ten results.
        Returns:
        sum.
